website_summaries.verdict: Updated and current exam prep with contemporary examples, graphics, and questions. A comprehensive guide with a budget price.
pros: Vivid colors and clear labeling for graphics and charts
If you’re interested in making notes in the book, the layout makes it easy to highlight and write in the margins
Small recap quizzes at the end of each chapter
cons: Poor editing with clarity needed in certain areas
Some sections would benefit from greater detail and more examples

customer_reviews.title: Very unprofessional editing.
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to very poor editing. Content was decent but I found many errors throughout the entire book. Even 2 test questions were unanswerable. One had the same answer for all 4 choices.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: If you will be studying for your state's P&C license, my best advice to you is to order a book that is geared to your specific state....not that the majority of the information is different among states. But, this book is SO lacking in basic knowledge that it is just not worth the money that you pay for it. Do yourself a favor....and don't waste your money, like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Debby in VA

customer_reviews.title: Not a valuable tool
customer_reviews.text: This book is not comprehensive and is riddled with erros. My image of a test question says all you need to know about the quality of their work
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: An Easy to Read and Understand Exam Guide
customer_reviews.text: The Guide gets a 5 star rating from me for several reasons. 1) The use of contrasting colors/boxes in the book to highlight definitions and concepts that are important in each chapter. 2) The Concept Review Chapter Summaries---and Chapter Test Sections to review and test per chapter---rather than one big test at the end of the book---as done by other publishers. 3) The Guide uses spacing and fonts that are easy to read and highlight important terms for memory and later review---making the book easier to read while doing the study process. Overall and excellent priced Exam Guide as entry into the insurance industry.
customer_reviews.author: Darong White

customer_reviews.title: Material that helped
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty pleased with the material that it covers. I had taken my test 2 times & failed both times when I was studying all the time using a different study guide. I was so sure I was going to pass the exam since I was flying through my practice quizzes with no problems at all. When I realized I wasnt remembering the information I was studying, I was memorizing the quiz questions. So I purchased this book &then studied from it as well. I go take my exam in 2 weeks. But I actually feel I know all the material not just what the quiz questions ask.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Peppinger

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: so far the book is very helpful I love the small quiz at the end of each chapter, very informative I have no complaints so far will see after i take the exam
customer_reviews.author: keith lundy

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: I’m preparing for this exam it was very helpful. I liked the questions and answers page and the pages on abbreviations helps a lot to understand. I will be prepared for my exam when I’m ready to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Holder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and easy to understand. I'm getting ready to get my license and this guide it will help me a lot, and if you send me the DVD I think I can easily pass this test. I think there is nothing to improve it's perfect as it is
customer_reviews.author: paty

customer_reviews.title: Way to many errors
customer_reviews.text: Way to many errors ! Waste or money ! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it some but will have to update mr review after exam.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: poor editing
customer_reviews.text: This book provides great information. Now that I am going back and looking at the answers that i missed, i find the book is very poorly edited- some of the answers for the final exam in the book are not correct. Some of the questions don't make sense at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very resourceful/helpful book
customer_reviews.text: I knew nothing about insurance, I took this course to get an overview of the Industry. I will be enrolling into the State of Florida required courses for 440 & 220. Your book gave me some great advantage / insight!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chapman

customer_reviews.title: recommend it to everyone, thank you very much!
customer_reviews.text: I want to thank Trivium Test Prep, for providing an excellent study material, I have not yet taken my exam, but soon with the help of the DVD I will pass and recommend it to everyone, thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Talys Raphael Luz

customer_reviews.title: help you easy study the course
customer_reviews.text: I think there have a lot of the key points and exam concepts can help me easy reading and understanding that save my a lot times for study .
customer_reviews.author: TitanRen

customer_reviews.title: P & C
customer_reviews.text: Great start for an intro to P & C insurance. Make sure you also learn your state requirements.
customer_reviews.author: If

customer_reviews.title: Easy layout
customer_reviews.text: very easy to understand but also in depth. i liked how it was laid out and focused on the main topics very good
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hedina

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to get your license in a very effective way.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome book, is helping me study and retain the information a lot quicker. IT is great at helping you retain the information with the little quizzes at the end of every
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Good guide
customer_reviews.text: So far I am liking this guide, easy and simple to follow through.
customer_reviews.author: kmanigundan

customer_reviews.title: Good study guide
customer_reviews.text: The way the book was written really helped me understand the concepts for the test!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Book is very helpful so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: Am still preparing for the test but the book is very helpful so far
customer_reviews.author: Pramod Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The guide broke info down into manageable pieces and wasn't overwhelming like some others I've tried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Book is Great.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was wonderful with this book. Studying for license make this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mary crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide!
customer_reviews.text: This study guide has a full glossy of terms to learn for the exam. There are graphs to study and learn as well. Plus, full test and answers included in the back. The book has so much study materials, that I was impressed with the book. I couldn't ask for more. It was well-organized and detailed. Everything needed for the exam all in this booklet. I received this copy from the publisher. This is my voluntary review.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Urban

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This product is helping me study for my insurance state license exam. It’s better than I expected. Definitely a must even if you have a program online. This is way easier to access there’s no timeout or having to log back in.
customer_reviews.author: Reaves

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Read and Understand Key Words
customer_reviews.text: This is the best study guide I've used in the past weeks since I started studying for my State Exam. The guide eliminates meaningless information not need and goes straight to the key points. Highlighting important words with simple to understand definitions. I also, liked that at the end of every section, it provides a good review. Ways to improve the product would be, in my opinion, when giving samples of any forms, making them actual size for us to see and read the detail in the forms. Also, providing more chapter questions pertaining to the chapters.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Rico

customer_reviews.title: Valuable information here!
customer_reviews.text: I give it a five, because so far, the way the material is explained in your book has been easily retained. I have other test prep books that aren’t. I am also only 25% through the book. My test isn’t scheduled yet, i have 90 days to prep. I would be happy to additionally review after having completed the book and exam.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Free DVD offer for essential test tips!
customer_reviews.text: This guide reviews the concepts of General Insurance, Insurance Basics, Property Insurance, Casualty Insurance, other types of policies and Insurance Regulation. There's also 125 practice test questions with test tips and study strategies.
customer_reviews.author: Davinna

customer_reviews.title: Great, to the point study guide!
customer_reviews.text: I am about half way through the book and it has given me a clear and great understanding of what the P&C License is and how it can be used. Thank you for creating this to the point study guide and for making it just the essentials. I am using this book to give me good base before taking a study class next month, then going for the test. So far this book has given me a great head start and helped me understand a lot of things that I never knew about insurance.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive study guide
customer_reviews.text: I like the layout by topics and bullet points with answers following the questions. It’s very comprehensive and easy to understand the concepts. May be helpful to have flash cards.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzid4

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Additional Study Book
customer_reviews.text: I like your study guide because it teaches the concepts, in understanding the vital importances needed for the state exam - in a much simpler form than other study guides. Definitely a good product to have! I do wish the book had more than 1 simulated exam.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Good guide
customer_reviews.text: I loved the exam study guide. But I wish it had more information pertaining certain property and casualty items not listed or for it to be more in depth about certain insurance topics. But over all good book with alot of information. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela ochoa

customer_reviews.title: The Best Book Available
customer_reviews.text: It is for sure a five star as it has already helped me a lot. The materials in the book was a lot more than I expected. However it was greatly explained to where I could understand it and not feel overwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: Garrettfutch

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: Im currently getting threw this book and it is great study material. For my next course ill make sure its a guide provided by Trivium
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Author was clear and very knowledgeable!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed the book and was very helpful! It was very well written and helped me to understand Insurance so much better! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: HESI A2
customer_reviews.text: I bought HESI A2 test study guide 2018-2019,I rated it to be 4, It is very helpful for preparing the test, wish it could have more practice test
customer_reviews.author: Travis Clark

customer_reviews.title: Useful information!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow has all the info needed for the test
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good, with errors
customer_reviews.text: good book for basics, and studying. but who publishes a book with this many errors? yikes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: The product has been very helpful with explaining how to get and understand answers
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bane

product_meta.title: Property and Casualty Insurance License Exam Study Guide 2019-2020: P&C Exam Prep and Practice Test Questions
